features: Perfect Compatibility - According to the coffee brew basket of the original machine, accurate mold opening, this permanent filter truly compatible with Ninja CFP201, CFP300, CFP301(c), CFP305, CFP400 & CFP451 Dualbrew Pro System Coffee maker. Please confirm the model of the machine before purchasing. This 4 cone coffee filters is only compatible with Ninja CFP series coffee machines, not compatible with other Ninja series coffee machines！

Not Just a Simple Brew - The new dual brew coffee machines and k cup coffee capsules do not simply extract coffee through water flow. They also provide brewing pressure during brewing, which is crucial in the process of making coffee. The special concave top cover of this coffee capsule for ninja dual brew coffee maker perfectly fits the brewing head of the coffee machine, ensuring that the pressure will not leak, and providing the best coffee experience!

Continuous Improvement - Not only did we improve the top cover of the coffee capsule, but we even found through experiments that the area of the stainless steel filter screen also affected the brewing experience. The current filter screen area is perfectly balanced with the release speed of water flow, greatly reducing the coffee splash, and will not mess up your coffee machine.
Reliable Material - All for ninja coffee maker filter manufacturing processes are large assembly line workshop production, food-grade materials, 304 stainless steel, BPA free, durable and safe.

You will get 3* reusable coffee pods and 2* permanent coffee filter compatible with Ninja Dual Brew Coffee Maker to make different flavors of coffee for your family and friends. We strive to provide unmatched customer service and support. If you are not satisfied with our products or have quality problems, please contact us and we will provide kindly service within 48 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Food-Grade Material Each coffee pod is made by strict material selection, BPA free, modern assembly line workshop production. High-Quality Stainless Steel The area of the filter screen is perfectly balanced with the brewing speed of the dual brew coffee maker, the best filtering area! Reusable Reduce the use of disposable capsules, fewer coffee pods will be thrown to the earth, more sustainable. New Structural Design The concave design fits perfectly with the brewing head structure of the dual brew coffee machine.

QUESTIONS & ANSWER 1. Why the coffee pod has a small tear or a hole in the bottom mesh？ When put the coffee capsule into the pod adapter, align the indicator mark of the capsule and then put it in. (Do not put the capsule into the pod adapter first and then rotate it to align the hole position. This is the key to capsule damage!） ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 2. Why coffee sprayed everywhere during brewing? When using coffee capsules, the coffee machine's brewing basket and pod adapter need to be put in the coffee machine at the same time to brew normally. If you find that there is an extra coffee brewing basket around your machine, you need to confirm whether you use the coffee machine correctly! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 3. It didn't fit my dualbrew my coffee maker. This capsule is only compatible with ‘three hole’ coffee machine(Specialized for CFP series, for example, please pay attention to distinguish CFP301 and CP301, they are completely different!), please confirm your coffee machine model before purchasing! ------------------ All words references to "ninja" are intended to describe the compatibility of our coffee pods. Doesn't mean we're connected to ”ninja“.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more paper filters
reviews.reviewText: Love these filters. They fit my Ninja perfectly and I no longer need paper filters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fine coffee filters
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and great fit to Ninja dual brew coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as described
reviews.reviewText: If you get these, make sure you use the large filter cup that comes with the Ninja when you use the reusable Keurig filters. Otherwise it will splatter coffee all over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit perfect except for the incompatible of Nepresso.
reviews.reviewText: Works for coffe filter but not the small one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VALUE, ECO FRIENDLY AND EASY TO CLEAN!
reviews.reviewText: Love these drip coffee filters. Bought them for my multi-brew options drip coffee pot I just bought and am happy as a claim. They are sturdy, well made, not cheap, reusable and clean up like a dream. Great value package and I'd buy again, and am giving as stocking stuffers to friends and family who can use them. Well worth buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this product for my Ninja dual brew coffee maker. The filters for making a carafe are great. The single cup filters have 3 holes in the top instead of 1 so they do not work at all. Very disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Less waste, less running out of paper filters
reviews.reviewText: Product is easy to use and easy to clean. From a full pot to just one cup of flavored coffee, these are perfect. I use one on one day, the next clean it and use the dry one that was drying from the last time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly, and having spares is actually really nice so I don’t wait for one to dry when I want to use it again
Exactly as described. Works perfectly with my Ninja.
We purchased a new Ninja Coffee pot
Excelente, justo lo que estaba buscando para no generar tanta basura con los filtros desechables, vienen dos grandes y dos individuales.
FUNCIONAN PERFECTAMENTE PARA LA CAFETERA EN TAMAÑO Y TODO
